case_circumstances:
July 2002 subject committed suicide in Eastlake, Ohio while he was living under the name of Joseph Newton Chandler 111, date of birth 03/11/1937.  After his death it was uncovered that the subject who committed suicide was not the real Chandler and living under the name of Joseph Newton Chandler 111 since 1978 in Cleveland, Ohio. The real Joseph Newton Chandler 111 was a 9 year old boy who died in a traffic accident in Weatherford, Texas in 1945 with both his parents. The true identity of this individual is not known. 

The subject in question was a Electrical Designer and Draftsman. He assumed the identity in 1978 in Rapid City, South Dakota and then immediately resided in Cleveland, Ohio. Extremely talented in Electronics and Drafting. Subject was a complete loner and believed on the run from law enforcement since at least 1978.
case_head_hair: Hair was gray at the time of death but subject may have been wearing a wig. Death report stated subject had frontal male pattern baldness.
